descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Mason Plumlee wins the opening tip for the Pistons, but Patrick Williams swoops in to get the ball and then takes it in for a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Patrick Williams takes opening tip in for a slam) 2021/3/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Patrick Williams takes opening tip in for a slam
